("FII TREAZ LA VOLAN!") - annual national road safety campaign, focusing on increasing Romanian traffic participants' awareness regarding the risks they expose themselves through incorrect/ illegal behaviour in traffic and the safety measures they can take to be better drivers/ better pedestrians etc., indirectly decreasing the number of road accidents; "October - The Household Insurance Month" (Octombrie - Luna Asigurarilor de Locuinte) - annual financial education campaign aiming to increase Romanians' knowledge regarding household insurance products and their importance for financial protection)
